thread.title: 2017 People’s Choice Awards: Blake Shelton Calls Gwen Stefani the ‘Hottest Date’ Ever
thread.title_full: 2017 People’s Choice Awards: Blake Shelton Calls Gwen Stefani the ‘Hottest Date’ Ever

author: Celebuzz
title: 2017 People’s Choice Awards: Blake Shelton Calls Gwen Stefani the ‘Hottest Date’ Ever
text:
MORE >> 
Blake Shelton made sure to give his girlfriend a shoutout when he took the stage at the   Award. 
Accepting the awards for Favorite Male Country Artist Award and Favorite Album, the country crooner couldn’t help but gush about Gwen Stefani when he gave his acceptance speech. Pointing her out from the audience, Shelton called the No Doubt frontwoman the “hottest date here tonight” and thanked her for her unconditional support for If I’m Honest . Watch @VictoriaJustice present @blakeshelton with his #PCAs for “Favorite Male Country Artist” and “Favorite Album” pic.twitter.com/rdyM40mSNm 
Stefani appeared on the album in a duet called “ Go Ahead and Break My Heart ,” which was written when the two first started dating in 2015. 
After accepting his awards, Shelton, 40, met up with Stefani, 47, backstage. The couple couldn’t keep their hands off each other as they happily posed for photographers. Relationship goals, much?
